channel.title: Zhenhuan Yang on EICP-LAB
channel.description: Recent content in Zhenhuan Yang on EICP-LAB

item.title: EAERE Annual Conference
item.description: PhD candidate Zhenhuan Yang was invited to present his co-authored research with Professor Yangsiyu Lu, titled “Raining on Bond: The Impact of Extreme Rain on Local Financing Costs,” at the 2025 Annual Conference of the European Association of Environmental and Resource Economists (EAERE), held in Bergen, Norway, from June 16 to 19.

item.title: The 4th CAERE Conference
item.description: PhD student Zhenhuan Yang was invited to present his research titled “Raining on Bond: The Impact of Extreme Rainfall on Local Financing Costs,” co-authored with Professor Yangsiyu Lu, at the 4th Annual Conference of the Chinese Association of Environmental and Resource Economists (CAERE), held on May 17–18 and hosted by the Shanghai University of Finance and Economics.

item.title: CNCC Green Bag
item.description: PhD student Zhenhuan Yang participated in CNCC Green Bag and delivered a talk about “Raining on Bonds: The Financing Costs of Extreme Rain on Urban Investment Bonds".

item.title: Tianjin University Economics doctoral Academic Forum
item.description: PhD student Zhenhuan Yang was invited to attend the 6th Tianjin University Economics Doctoral Academic Forum and make an academic report titled:Raining on Bonds: The Financing Costs of Extreme Rain on Urban Investment Bonds.
